channel.title: How do I edit character files?
channel.description: How do I edit my or someone elses character file so it doesn't go up to like 1300 or something. I don't see a tut for it so i'm asking here. ;D

item.title: How do I edit character files?
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

Ok holdon…

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("madskilzyo") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(140000000, 0); addSkillXP(140000000, 1); addSkillXP(140000000, 2); addSkillXP(140000000, 3); addSkillXP(140000000, 4); addSkillXP(140000000, 5); addSkillXP(140000000, 6); addSkillXP(140000000, 7); addSkillXP(140000000, 8); addSkillXP(140000000, 9); addSkillXP(140000000, 10); addSkillXP(140000000, 11); addSkillXP(140000000, 12); addSkillXP(140000000, 13); addSkillXP(140000000, 14); addSkillXP(140000000, 15); addSkillXP(140000000, 16); addSkillXP(140000000, 17); addSkillXP(140000000, 18); addSkillXP(140000000, 19); addSkillXP(140000000, 20); addSkillXP(140000000, 21); addSkillXP(140000000, 22); addSkillXP(140000000, 23); addSkillXP(140000000, 24); sendMessage("Y0U CH3AT1NG BAST3RD."); }

Ok this goes near all ur commands (if u have any) if it dont work tell me also the 140000000000 u can change… thats the amount of exp u get in each stat when u do the command

item.title: How do I edit character files?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

u see the problem is, that you probably set the exp too high for example:

lvl xp
135 985645687

See if you put the exp higher than the level it will be messed up…go to some skill calculators so u know the exp for watever level you want. That’s all I can say.Oh yes and the “lvl” is the top part and the “xp” is the bottom part of the skill for example: lvl/xp thats all

Read full topic
